languages.text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость, теперь и помирать можно спокойно. Вот только..." {n}Вигастис бросает хмурый взгляд на сидящего в клетке Комиссара.{/n} "Если позволите говорить свободно, то в клетке словно ксеноса его держать... Даже такая тварь как он не заслуживает гнить в этом аду. Как по мне, уж лучше сразу казнить как предателя".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость, теперь и помирать можно спокойно. Вот только..." {n}Вигастис бросает хмурый взгляд на сидящего в клетке Комиссара.{/n} "Если позволите говорить свободно, то в клетке словно ксеноса его держать... Даже такая тварь как он не заслуживает гнить в этом аду. Как по мне, уж лучше сразу казнить как предателя".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Now I can die in peace. Except..." {n}Vigastes frowns as he looks at the caged Commissar.{/n} "If I may speak freely... Keeping him in a cage, like a xenos... Even a monster like him doesn't deserve to rot in this thrice-damned place. If it were up to me, I would execute him as a traitor and be done with it."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость, теперь и помирать можно спокойно. Даже такая тварь как он не заслуживает гнить в этом аду. Как по мне, уж лучше сразу казнить как предателя".

traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「陛下、ありがとうございます。これで安らかに死ぬことができる。ただ…」{n}ヴィガステスは檻に入れられたコミッサーを見て顔をしかめた。{/n}「言わせていただけるなら…こいつを異種族のように檻に入れておくことは…あんな怪物のような者でも、この三度呪われた場所で腐らせるのは間違っています。私なら彼を裏切り者として処刑して終わらせます」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Now I can die in peace. Except..." {n}Vigastes frowns as he looks at the caged Commissar.{/n} "If I may speak freely... Keeping him in a cage, like a xenos... Even a monster like him doesn't deserve to rot in this thrice-damned place. If it were up to me, I would execute him as a traitor and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ありがとうございます。これで安らかに死ぬことができる。ただ…」{n}ヴィガステスは檻に入れられたコミッサーを見て顔をしかめた。{/n}「言わせていただけるなら…こいつを異種族のように檻に入れておくことは…あんな怪物のような者でも、この三度呪われた場所で腐らせるのは間違っています。私なら彼を裏切り者として処刑して終わらせます」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “谢谢您，大人。现在就算是死了，也可以心满意足了，不过……”{n}维加斯特皱着某头，看着关在笼子里的政委。{/n}“如果您允许我开口的话……像异形一样，把他关在笼子里……就算是像他这样的人渣，也不该烂死在这该死的地方。如果由我来决定的话，我会以叛徒的罪名将他处决，一了百了。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Now I can die in peace. Except..." {n}Vigastes frowns as he looks at the caged Commissar.{/n} "If I may speak freely... Keeping him in a cage, like a xenos... Even a monster like him doesn't deserve to rot in this thrice-damned place. If it were up to me, I would execute him as a traitor and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢您，大人。现在就算是死了，也可以心满意足了，不过……”{n}维加斯特皱着某头，看着关在笼子里的政委。{/n}“如果您允许我开口的话……像异形一样，把他关在笼子里……就算是像他这样的人渣，也不该烂死在这该死的地方。如果由我来决定的话，我会以叛徒的罪名将他处决，一了百了。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «Gracias. Ahora puedo morir en paz. Salvo...». {n}Vigastes frunce el ceño mientras mira al Comisario enjaulado.{/n} «Si puedo hablar libremente... Tenerlo en una jaula, como a un xenos... Ni siquiera un monstruo como él merece pudrirse en este maldito lugar. Si fuera por mí, lo ejecutaría como traidor y acabaría con esto».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Now I can die in peace. Except..." {n}Vigastes frowns as he looks at the caged Commissar.{/n} "If I may speak freely... Keeping him in a cage, like a xenos... Even a monster like him doesn't deserve to rot in this thrice-damned place. If it were up to me, I would execute him as a traitor and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias. Ahora puedo morir en paz. Salvo...». {n}Vigastes frunce el ceño mientras mira al Comisario enjaulado.{/n} «Si puedo hablar libremente... Tenerlo en una jaula, como a un xenos... Ni siquiera un monstruo como él merece pudrirse en este maldito lugar. Si fuera por mí, lo ejecutaría como traidor y acabaría con esto».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Jetzt kann ich in Frieden sterben. Nur ..." {n}Vigastes blickt mit gerunzelter Stirn auf den Kommissar in seinem Käfig.{/n} "Wenn ich offen sprechen darf ... Ihn in einem Käfig zu halten, wie einen Xenos ... Selbst ein Monster wie er hat es nicht verdient, in dieser dreimal verfluchten Hölle zu verrotten. Ginge es nach mir, ich würde ihn als Verräter hinrichten und fertig."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Now I can die in peace. Except..." {n}Vigastes frowns as he looks at the caged Commissar.{/n} "If I may speak freely... Keeping him in a cage, like a xenos... Even a monster like him doesn't deserve to rot in this thrice-damned place. If it were up to me, I would execute him as a traitor and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Jetzt kann ich in Frieden sterben. Nur ..." {n}Vigastes blickt mit gerunzelter Stirn auf den Kommissar in seinem Käfig.{/n} "Wenn ich offen sprechen darf ... Ihn in einem Käfig zu halten, wie einen Xenos ... Selbst ein Monster wie er hat es nicht verdient, in dieser dreimal verfluchten Hölle zu verrotten. Ginge es nach mir, ich würde ihn als Verräter hinrichten und fertig."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. Maintenant, je peux mourir en paix. Sauf que... » {n}Vigastes fronce les sourcils en regardant le commissaire enfermé dans sa cage.{/n} « Si je puis me permettre... Le garder comme ça, dans une cage, comme un xénos... Même un monstre comme lui ne mérite pas de pourrir ici. Si ça ne tenait qu'à moi, j'exécuterais purement et simplement ce traître. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Now I can die in peace. Except..." {n}Vigastes frowns as he looks at the caged Commissar.{/n} "If I may speak freely... Keeping him in a cage, like a xenos... Even a monster like him doesn't deserve to rot in this thrice-damned place. If it were up to me, I would execute him as a traitor and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. Maintenant, je peux mourir en paix. Sauf que... » {n}Vigastes fronce les sourcils en regardant le commissaire enfermé dans sa cage.{/n} « Si je puis me permettre... Le garder comme ça, dans une cage, comme un xénos... Même un monstre comme lui ne mérite pas de pourrir ici. Si ça ne tenait qu'à moi, j'exécuterais purement et simplement ce traître. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Sağ olun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Artık huzur içinde ölebilirim. Gerçi..." {n}Vigastes, kafese tıkılan Komiser'e bakarken kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Müsaadenizle açık konuşacağım. Onu böyle bir zeno gibi kafeste tutmak... Onun gibi bir canavar bile bu adı batası lanetli yerde çürümeyi hak etmiyor. Bana kalsa hainliği yüzünden idam edip konuyu kapatırdım."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Now I can die in peace. Except..." {n}Vigastes frowns as he looks at the caged Commissar.{/n} "If I may speak freely... Keeping him in a cage, like a xenos... Even a monster like him doesn't deserve to rot in this thrice-damned place. If it were up to me, I would execute him as a traitor and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: "Sağ olun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Artık huzur içinde ölebilirim. Gerçi..." {n}Vigastes, kafese tıkılan Komiser'e bakarken kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Müsaadenizle açık konuşacağım. Onu böyle bir zeno gibi kafeste tutmak... Onun gibi bir canavar bile bu adı batası lanetli yerde çürümeyi hak etmiyor. Bana kalsaydı onu hain olarak idam edip konuyu kapatırdım."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
